body.name: TOTO Drake Two-Piece Elongated 1.28 GPF Universal Height TORNADO FLUSH Toilet with CEFIONTECT, Sedona Beige - CST776CEFG#12
body.stockDetail: Only 20 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 13 hrs 5 mins
features: POWERFUL PERFORMANCE WITH LESS FREQUENT CLEANING - TORNADO FLUSH swirls water in a circular pattern to fully wash the bowl surface. CEFIONTECT is an ultra-smooth glaze that minimizes waste from sticking so that it is easily washed away.

MORE COMFORT ACROSS A WIDER RANGE OF INDIVIDUALS - TOTO's Universal Height is taller than a standard toilet and makes sitting down and standing up easier for many people. Universal Height models are capable of meeting the ADA height requirement.

SAVE WATER WITHOUT SACRIFICE - The 1.28 GPF WaterSense certified Drake enables you to save water without worrying about diminished performance. The Drake features a wide 3 inch flush valve and a siphon jet bowl that gets the job done in one flush.

STYLISH AND MODERN DESIGN - Update your oasis with this stylish design that couples well with any bathroom décor. The elongated bowl provides added space for comfort. The toilet fits into 12 inch rough-in installations and has a left-hand trip lever.

COMPLETE YOUR TOILET - Finish your purchase with the addition of a TOTO SoftClose seat or upgrade to a WASHLET bidet seat. Drake tank and bowl with hardware included. Purchased Separately: Wax ring, flange bolts, and water supply lines.
body.description: The TOTO® Drake® Two-Piece Elongated 1.28 GPF Universal Height TORNADO FLUSH® Toilet with CEFIONTECT® is a beautifully designed high profile toilet. The Drake features TOTO’s TORNADO FLUSH®, a rimless, hole-free design with dual-nozzles that creates a centrifugal washing action that assists in rinsing the bowl more efficiently. This version of the TOTO Drake includes CEFIONTECT®, a layer of exceptionally smooth glaze that minimizes waste from sticking to the ceramic. CEFIONTECT, coupled with TORNADO FLUSH, assists to reduce the frequency of toilet cleanings, minimizing the usage of water, harsh chemicals, and time required for cleaning. This version of the TOTO Drake is designed in TOTO’s Universal Height, which allows for a more comfortable seat position across a wide range of users. This version of the Drake has a left-hand chrome trip lever, is ADA compliant, and meets the standards for EPA WaterSense®, and California’s CEC and CALGreen requirements. The Drake bowl and tank set includes a tank to bowl gasket, tank to bowl hardware, and toilet bolt caps. Additional items needed for installation and use must be purchased separately: wax ring, toilet mounting bolts, water supply lines, and toilet seat.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us At TOTO, we design simple, brilliant, elegant solutions for basic human needs. That means a TOTO bathroom is always more than a routine. It’s a ritual where every innovation, every detail, is designed with you in mind. For over 100 years TOTO has been dedicated to improving lives around the globe through tirelessly designing and engineering products that deliver innovative technology while still maintaining the beauty expected from TOTO. POWERFUL PERFORMANCE, DEPENDABLE CLEAN Drake Two-Piece Elongated 1.28 GPF Toilet The Drake Two-Piece Elongated Universal Height TORNADO FLUSH Toilet with CEFIONTECT is intentionally designed with cleanliness in mind. The Drake features a rimless, hole-free design with dual nozzles that create a highly efficient centrifugal washing action for better bowl rinse after each flush. With the assistance of the CEFIONTECT exceptionally smooth glaze, waste is prevented from adhering to the surface, ensuring the toilet bowl stays cleaner longer. ADA Compliant to serve the needs of everyone without additional adaptation. Flushing system meets WaterSense, CALGreen, and CEC standards and guidelines. Available in additional colors and features to maximize benefits and coordinate with all bathroom spaces.

Effective, Efficient, and Environmentally Focused Cleaning System Powerful Flushing System Our TORNADO FLUSH flushing system generates 360-degrees of cleaning power that reaches every spot. Advanced Clean Technology Our CEFIONTECT ceramic glaze minimizes waste from sticking to porous ceramic surfaces. Improved Water Spot A large water spot that reduces the places where waste can cling to the bowl. Water Conservation TOTO 1.28 GPF toilet models save approximately 5 gallons of water a day and 1,825 gallons or more per year! *The average American flushes five times a day at home. Assuming an average household of 3.2 people over 365 days.

Everything You'll Need to Experience Next-Level Clean Everything you need is within reach! This model will come with both tank and toilet bowl included. Simply purchase compatible seat, installation hardware and wax ring. Elevate your experience by upgrading to one of our TOTO WASHLET Electronic Bidet seats, delivering next-level clean and a pampered spa-like feeling after each use.

Choose the Drake That's Right for You! Newly Designed with Everyone in Mind TOTO's Drake Toilet comes in a variety of options to fit your unique needs and complement your bathroom space. Available in standard or Universal Height, 1.28 or 1.6 GPF, 10 or 12 inch rough-in sizes, and with trip levers located on the left or right side of the tank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the Best flushing Toilets
reviews.reviewText: I'm a Plumber and one of my customers wanted this toilet as he has 3 at his house and now 3 for his Beach house. Price was a little better deal here then he or I could get at the Supply House. The special coating they use is very slick so when you do your dooty it doesn't stick to the bowl. You Get what you pay for.
